title: Sandies Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugar
Add vanilla and flour, mix well
Add nuts, mix
Drop by teaspoon onto ungreesed cookie sheet
Cook at 325 F for 18-20 mins. Do not brown

title: Peanut Butter Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 F
Thoroughly cream shortening, vanilla, sugar, brown sugar
Add eggs and beat well
Stir in peanut butter
In a separate bowl, mix together flour, salt, baking soda
Add flour mixture to peanut butter mixture, combine thoroughly
Form into tiny balls and place on cookie sheets
Press each cookie twice with the back of a fork to make a crisscross design
Bake 8-10 mins

title: Cheesecake
instructions: Crumb crust: Mix graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 c sugar (scant), butter. Press firmly over the bottom and up the sides 2 1/2 inches of a heavily buttered spring-form pan. Chill.
Filling: Let cream cheese soften in a bowl
Blend 1 1/2 c sugar with cream cheese
Add salt. Beat until fluffy
Add eggs one at a time beating well at low speed after each addition
Beat in 1 tsp. vanilla and 8 oz sour cream
Pour into crumb crust
Bake at 350 F for 50 mins or more until up to the rim of the pan and slightly browned
Remove from oven and let stand for 15 mins
Topping: Mix remaining 8 oz. sour cream with 1 tsp vanilla and 2 tblsp sugar
Spead topping on cake. Return to oven for 10 minutes
CHILL completely
